casebody.data:
CASE ANNOUNCEMENTS

April 28, 2014

[Cite as 04/28/2014 Case Announcements, 2014-Ohio-1765.]

MOTION AND PROCEDURAL RULINGS

2014-0472. BAC Home Loans Servicing, L.P. v. Haas.

Marion App. No. 9-13-40, 2014-Ohio-438. This cause is pending before the court as an appeal from the Court of Appeals for Marion County.

Upon consideration of appellants’ motion for mediation, it is ordered by the court that the motion is granted. The court refers this case to mediation under S.Ct.Prac.R. 19.01 and stays all filing deadlines for this case until further notice. The court will not issue any decision on the merits of this case until mediation has concluded.
